entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 1.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
